required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Efficacy and Safety Study of Sodium Oligo-mannurarate (GV-971) Capsule for the Treatment of Alzheimer's Disease
clinical_study.official_title: Phase III Study of Sodium Oligo-mannurarate (GV-971) Capsule on Mild to Moderate Alzheimer Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The primary purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy and safety of Sodium Oligo-mannurarate (GV-971) in 36-week treatment of mild to moderate Alzheimer's disease.

primary_outcome.measure: Improvement of Alzheimer's Disease Assessment Scale-cognitive subscale(ADAS-cog)/12 of sodium oligo-mannurarate capsule

secondary_outcome.measure: Improvement of Clinician's Interview-Based Impression of Change Plus(CIBIC-plus) of sodium oligo-mannurarate capsule
Improvement of Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study/Activities of Daily(ADCS-ADL) of sodium oligo-mannurarate capsule
Improvement of Neuropsychiatric Inventory(NPI) of sodium oligo-mannurarate capsule
Glucose metabolism of bilateral temporoparietal cortex
secondary_outcome.description: Obtained by Positron Emission Tomography in two sites.

intervention.description: sodium oligo-mannurarate capsule 900mg twice a day for 24 weeks
